welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ponta Grossa, a charming city known for its historical architecture, vibrant culture, and beautiful natural landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit. Welcome to Ponta Grossa!

restaurants.address: R. Com. Miro, 969 (entre Cel. Francisco Ribas e R. Balduíno Taques), Ponta Grossa, PR, 84010-160
